sentences.english: I think at this point, the statement of the Buddha comes in.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得在这点上，佛语就有阐明。

sentences.english: As Buddhism says, they are having the spiritual practice and experience on the way of art.
sentences.chinese: 借用佛语，他们在艺术的路途上修行体验。

sentences.english: It can also be expressed by the Buddha's words—— a world in a wild flower, and a bodhi in a leaf.
sentences.chinese: 也可以借用佛语“一花一世界，一叶一菩提”来表达。

definition: Amitabha Buddha/the Buddha of the Western paradise/may the lord Buddha preserve us!/merciful Buddha!
Dharma (the teachings of the Buddha)/Buddhist doctrine
Buddha-like heart (full of compassion)/spirit of Buddha (awakened to reality and no longer clinging to appearances)
Avatamsaka sutra of the Huayan school/also called Buddhavatamsaka-mahavaipulya Sutra, the Flower adornment sutra or the Garland sutra
one of the many names of Buddha
Amitabha, the Buddha of the Western Paradise/abbr. for 阿彌陀佛|阿弥陀佛/Mituo or Mito township in Kaohsiung county 高雄縣|高雄县[Gao1 xiong2 xian4], southwest Taiwan
